tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneticVariants (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_name VARCHAR(255),
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  chromosome_number INT,
  position INT,
  phenotype VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE variants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_name VARCHAR(255),
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT
);

CREATE TABLE phenotypes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    phenotype_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    variant_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES variants(id)
);

CREATE TABLE variants (
  variant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  position INTEGER NOT NULL,
  reference VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  alternate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE phenotypes (
  phenotype_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  phenotype_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE variant_phenotype (
  variant_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  phenotype_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (variant_id, phenotype_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES variants(variant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (phenotype_id) REFERENCES phenotypes(phenotype_id)
)

CREATE TABLE variants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  allele VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE phenotypes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE variant_phenotype (
  variant_id INT,
  phenotype_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (variant_id, phenotype_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES variants(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (phenotype_id) REFERENCES phenotypes(id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Variant (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_name TEXT,
  chromosome TEXT,
  position INT,
  gene TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Phenotype (
  phenotype_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  phenotype_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VariantPhenotype (
  variant_id INT,
  phenotype_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES Variant(variant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (phenotype_id) REFERENCES Phenotype(phenotype_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name TEXT,
  affiliation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Publication (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
)
